top.title: Israel says it killed top Hezbollah official in first attack on Beirut in months
top.summary: Israel has escalated its campaign on targets it says are linked to Hezbollah, raising fears of a resumption of hostilities.

top.title: Fifty children escape after mass school abduction in Nigeria
top.summary: The raid on a Christian school came amid a surge of attacks by armed groups in the African nation.

top.title: G20 summit boycotted by US closes in South Africa
top.summary: South African President Cyril Ramaphosa says there is a "renewed commitment to multilateral co-operation".

top.title: Vinted blocks 'sickening' sexually explicit ads
top.summary: The online marketplace removed adverts which included a video a user said depicted a pornographic scene.

top.title: Teens plead not guilty over TfL cyber-attack
top.summary: Thalha Jubair, 19, and Owen Flowers, 18,  are charged with conspiring to commit unauthorised acts.

top.title: Graduate jobs under threat from AI, PwC boss says
top.summary: The accountancy giant says artificial intelligence will eventually lead to fewer entry-level positions at the firm.

title.#text: Sony’s last-gen XM4 headphones are over 50 percent off for Black Friday
Vine walked so TikTok could run
Apple TV wants to go big
